data.text: Dimaadua gu haga maluagina a Sarah gii hai be dana hagababa,
gei Sarah ga hai dama ga haanau dana dama daane gi Abraham i di madagoaa o mee gu madua. Tama daane la ne haanau i di madagoaa a God dela ne hai bolo mee e haanau ai.21.2 Hebrews 11.11
Abraham gaa gahi di ingoo o maa go Isaac.
Di madagoaa Isaac ne walu ono laangi, gei Abraham ga sirkumsais a mee be nia helekai a God ne hai.21.4 Genesis 17.12; Nnegau 7.8
Abraham la guu lau ono ngadau di madagoaa Isaac ne haanau.

Sarah ga helekai boloo, “God gu gaamai gi di au di tene mo di gadagada.21.6 Di ingoo Isaac i nnelekai Hebrew le hai dono hadinga boloo: Gadagada Digau huogodoo ala ga longono di mee deenei, la ga gadagada madalia au.”
Gei mee ga helekai labelaa, “Ma koai dela e helekai gi Abraham bolo Sarah ga haga uu ana dama? Gei deenei au dela gu haanau gi mee dana dama daane, gei mee gu madumadua.”
Di tama la gu tomo aga, gaa dae loo gi di laangi di tama ne daa gi daha mo di uu, gei Abraham guu hai dana hagamiami damana.
Dahi laangi hua, gei Sarah gaa mmada gi Ishmael dela ne haanau go Hagar di hege ahina mai Egypt gi Abraham, e hai ana daagala ginaua mo Isaac di tama Sarah.

Gei mee ga helekai gi Abraham, “Hagau ina tama ahina hege deenei mo dana dama la gi daha. Tama daane o tama ahina hege deenei la hagalee hai dono duhongo i di baahi do maluagina dela belee kae go tau dama go Isaac.”21.10 Galatians 4.29-30
Di mee deenei gu haga lodo huaidu a Abraham huoloo, idimaa, Ishmael la tama daane labelaa ni mee.

Gei God ga helekai gi Abraham, “Goe hudee mamaanadu lodo huaidu gi di tama mo di hege go Hagar. Heia hua di hai a Sarah ma gaa hai adu gi di goe, idimaa, do hagadili le e daamada mai i Isaac.21.12 Romans 9.7; Hebrews 11.18
Au e wanga labelaa agu dama e logo gi tama daane a tama ahina hege, gii hai digaula di nadau henua, idimaa, mee di tama labelaa ni aau.”

Hagaluada loo dono daiaa, gei Abraham gaa wanga nia meegai gi Hagar mo tei budehede gili kau e honu i nia wai. Mee gaa dugu di tama la gi hongo di tua o maa, ga hagau a mee gii hana. Mee ga hagatanga ga hagadau i lodo di anggowaa o Beersheba.
Di madagoaa nia wai la ne odi, gei mee gaa dugu di tama la gi lala di laagau i lodo geinga,

gaa hana gaa noho i nia piidi e dolu lau mada tanga i daha mo mee. Mee ga helekai ang gi deia, “Au e deemee di mmada gi dagu dama e made.” Dono madagoaa dela e noho i golo, gei mee ga daamada gaa dangi.21.16 gei mee ga daamada gaa dangi be: gei di tama ga daamada gaa dangi

God gu longono Ia tama daane e dangidangi, gei tangada di langi o God ga helekai gi Hagar mai i di langi boloo, “Hagar, goe e lodo huaidu di aha? Goe hudee madagu. God gu longono Ia tama daane dela e dangidangi.
Du gi nua, hana, dahi aga ina a mee mo di heia a mee gi manawa lamalia. Au gaa hai dagu henua damana mai i dono hagadili.”
Gei God gaa huge nia golomada o Hagar, gei mee gaa mmada gi di monowai geli, gei mee gaa hana ga haga hau dana budehede gili kau gi nia wai, gaa wanga nia mada wai gi di tama.
God nogo madalia di tama dono tomo aga. Mee nogo noho i lodo di Anggowaa o Paran, gaa hai tangada e iloo ia huoloo di kumi manu.
Tinana o maa gaa gida dana ahina o Egypt, guu hai di lodo o Ishmael.
Di madagoaa deelaa, Abimelech guu hana dalia Phicol, di tagi di buini dauwa a maa, ga helekai gi Abraham, “God e madalia goe i nia mee huogodoo ala e hai kooe.21.22 Genesis 26.26

Malaa, heia dau hagamodu i mua o Dimaadua bolo goe ga hagalee halahalau au, agu dama, be dogu hagadili. Au nogo hagalaamua goe, malaa, hagababa mai bolo goe e hagalaamua au mo tenua deenei e noho iei goe.”
Abraham ga helekai, “Au e hagababa beelaa.”
Abraham ga helekai hagadonudonu gi Abimelech i di gili di monowai ne haga anga ginai nia gau hai hegau Abimelech.
Abimelech ga helekai, “Au e de iloo ma koai ne hai di hai deenei. Goe digi hagia mai di maa, deenei hua dogu longono eau di maa.”
Abraham gaa wanga gi Abimelech hunu siibi mono kau, gei meemaa gaa hai di nau hagababa.
Abraham ga daa mai ana dama siibi e hidu i dana hagabuulinga siibi,
gei Abimelech ga heeu gi mee, “Ma nia mee e hai di aha?”
Abraham ga helekai, “Kaina nia siibi e hidu aanei. Goe gaa hai di mee deenei, gei goe gu hagamodongoohia bolo ma ko au dela ne geli di monowai deenei.”

Di gowaa deelaa gu haga ingoo bolo Beersheba,21.31 Beersheba: Di ingoo deenei i nnelekai Hebrew dono hadinga boloo “Di Monowai o di Hagababa” be “Di Monowai o di Hidu” (mmada labelaa i Genesis 26.33). idimaa deelaa di gowaa ne hai di nau hagababa.
I muli di nau hai di hagababa deenei i Beersheba, Abimelech mo Phicol gaa hula gi muli gi Philistia.
Abraham gaa dogi dana laagau ‘tamarisk’ i Beersheba, ga daumaha gi Yihowah, go di God dono hagaodi ai.
Abraham gaa noho i Philistia di madagoaa e waalooloo.
